name: Sigma Corporation
tag_list: cameras, lenses, camera-lenses, photography-equipment, telephoto-lens, camera-manufacturer, foveon-image-sensor, camera-flashes, flashes, high-quality-lenses, wide-angle, sd1-merrill, merrill-cameras, photography, macro-images, landscape-photography, japa
overview:
Welcome to the Official Sigma Corporation of America page! http://www.sigmaphoto.com/ http://blog.sigmaphoto.com/ http://www.twitter.com/Sigma_Photo http://www.youtube.com/user/SigmaAmerica Sigma Corporation of America is the US subsidiary of Sigma Corp.

Mission: For nearly 50 years, Sigma Corporation’s expertise and innovation has driven the company’s core philosophy of “knowledge, plus experience, plus imagination,” with an emphasis on producing high-quality, high-performance photographic technology at moderate prices.

Company Overview: This family-owned organization is the largest, independent SLR lens manufacturer in the world, producing more than 45 lenses that are compatible with most manufacturers, including Sigma, Canon, Sony, Nikon, Olympus and Pentax. Sigma Corporation also produces digital SLR cameras and high-definition digital compact cameras. The company is headquartered in Japan, with offices strategically located throughout Europe, Asia and North America. For information, please visit www.sigmaphoto.com.
